com.company

Class Residential

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Customer
      • com.company.Residential

  • public class Residential
extends Customer
    Version:
    1.0 Contains the attributes and methods for a residential customer
    Author:
    Ken Neltnor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Residential()
      I am using a constructor with no arguments as the attributes are delegated to the super class for customer data and senior status is defined in the method createResidentialCustomer This constructor instantiates the residential object, calls a method to create the customer object and prints the billing statement
